description:
Victor is a surfer who attempted to emulate his hero Jan by planting his flag at the peak of a rock whilst riding a huge wave called the "Humunga-Dunga".
After failing once he rescued a Pikachu which had washed up on the shore. The Pikachu, named Puka, had the an ability where it could sense big waves.
Many years later another "Humunga-Dunga" wave appeared and Victor successfully rode the surfboard along with Puka to put his flag alongside Jan`s. Pleased with his success, Victor told some young surfers that they could do it too.
name: Vincent
